snippet: A North Korean official, Ri Su-yong, said during talks with the Chinese in Beijing that his country would continue trying to expand its nuclear arsenal while striving to rebuild its economy.
abstract: North Korean official Ri Suyong states during visit to China that it is permanent policy of North to expand its nuclear arsenal while striving to rebuild its economy; relations between nations have been damaged by North's nuclear weapons program.

byline.contributor: Choe Sang-Hun contributed reporting from Seoul, South Korea. Yufan Huang contributed research from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: A North Korean official, Ri Su-yong, said during talks with the Chinese in Beijing that his country would continue trying to expand its nuclear arsenal while striving to rebuild its economy.

headline.main: North Korea Tells China of ‘Permanent’ Nuclear Policy
headline.print_headline: North Korea Tells China of ‘Permanent’ Nuclear Policy
